listitem.para: Indicate whether home directories for new users should be created as Btrfs subvolumes instead of regular directories.
If set to yes, and the underlying filesystem supports Btrfs subvolumes, the user's home directory will be created as a separate Btrfs subvolume.
When the --btrfs-subvolume-home command-line option is specified, a Btrfs subvolume is created regardless of this setting.
